website_summaries.verdict: The Netgear WG111 is one of the best all-around wireless USB adapters we've seen.
pros: plug-and-play support lets you easily share one adapter among many PCs
cons: External installation makes it susceptible to breakage

customer_reviews.title: SAD!!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed! I bought this for my WINDOWS 7 and it DOES NOT work! Wish they would of specified which operating systems this works for. Can someone point me to a wireless adapter that will actually work and that I am able to use the installation CD. All I have in my home is WI FI and I have a barely used older desktop p.c. It needs an adapter in order to get online. So disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Morningheart

customer_reviews.title: minor versions have major variations
customer_reviews.text: This adapter has a couple of different versions which vary widely in compatibility between sub versions. Some are very useful for adding wifi capability to open source OS desktops. Some are not. Be sure to know which specific version you are getting and check compatibility before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Lotte S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I've only just begun using the adapter, but so far it works perfectly. 1) Easy to install 2) Includes a USB extender cable (a nice and useful feature) 3) My download and upload speeds tested as the same as when the computer was hard-wired with the ethernet cable I'm at 95% signal strength one room away from the wifi antenna. I'm no expert, but this did exactly what it it was supposed to do. I have a Netgear antenna, so my only recommendation is to get a USB adapter from the same company that makes your wifi router. That was recommended to me by my IT guy at work and it worked flawlessly with this equipment.
customer_reviews.author: S.Zimm

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was taking a chance buying this; I moved my parent's computer from downstairs, to upstairs, and I thought this MIGHT work with their Netgear router (still downstairs.) I read some reviews on here that said that the range was short. We haven't had any connection problems and my parents are so happy that they don't have to be in the freezing basement to go on their computer. The only negative is that they're becoming addicted to the internet! I could have lucked out with this product, but it worked great for me.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rad

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these wireless adapters for my two kids older desktop PC's. Both setup very easily and I was connected to the internet in minutes. We have a wireless G router (Netgear) in a downstairs room and the adapters are both in upstairs bedrooms. Both receive an excellent signal. We do not do internet gaming or much downloading, and when downloading software updates to the PC's it isn't the fastest process but it gets it done within a reasonable timeframe. Overall we are pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but its bulky
customer_reviews.text: I am using this on my HP Pavillion dv6000 laptop with the Vista Home Premium OS. It's easy to install and it works well (I'm not going into the details of how it preforms since I have not compared it to other wireless devices, and, because I am just an average joe with basic tech knowledge). The only problem I have is that it is bulky. My USB ports are close together, so plugging it in means I can't plug in another USB device at the same time. If this item were slimmer, I'd give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Just plug this in your desktop and follow easy instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have if your using cable for internet and you have desktops through out your house ...You won't have cable wires all over the place....Just plug this in your desktop and follow easy instructions....but you do need a wireless router connected to your cable box first...
customer_reviews.author: knovo

customer_reviews.title: It Works Better Than You Think
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to extend the range of my netbook Wireless BGN, the blinky blue LED looks cool. Get at least 20% better signal. Quick performance. Works with Backtrack 4 software (for u network security types) Utilizes Realtek Chipset. Upgraded performance from WG111V2. Works great with Vista and Windows 7
customer_reviews.author: DJRAMBO954

customer_reviews.title: What a bargain!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at such a great price, I may as well have stolen it! When I ordered this I thought I was going to get a piece of junk in the mail or worse yet, not get anything at all because I swore it was a joke. I couldn't believe such a handy little piece of equipment was being sold so cheap! I have been using this since the second I opened the package and I do not have any complaints at all. If you need a wi fi adapter and you are on a budget, then this one is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Member

customer_reviews.title: It will work on Linux Kodibuntu
customer_reviews.text: It was plug and go for me on Linux I am using it on unbuntu and tryed it on kodibuntu and both worked right a away one of my HTPC hasUbuntu just because I tried a different wifi adapter and it would not work it seemed like it wasn't going work on kodibuntu but this one will work just plug it in and the problems are over
customer_reviews.author: michael w.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item.
customer_reviews.text: It was the wrong item for my TiVo. I returned it because it wasn't the correct item. Sorry about that. The item I need AG0-100(TiVo Wireless Adapter) but it's too expensive. Nothing wrong this item, just not the right one!!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzietish

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy Netgear Wg111 Wireless-G USB 2.0 Adapter
customer_reviews.text: Netgear Wireless-G USB 2.0 Adapter Wg111 isn't VISTA compatible. There is a software download to fix the compatiblity issues from Netgear but I didn't have much luck with it. It has a very high mortality rate! Mine died less than 60 days after install, a friend has replaced hers 3 times in the past 9 months. Spend a little more and get the G54 Wireless USB Adapter WG111. Easy to install, VISTA compatible and once installed keeps on working!!
customer_reviews.author: ammahas6

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because I have a Netgear wireless router figuring that this would cut down on compatibility issues. Either I was right or this is simply an excellent product. I had no problems at all with installation or functionality. This hardware has worked perfectly in the two weeks I've used it.
customer_reviews.author: JWM

customer_reviews.title: Not great as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my desktop inorder to avoid wires. The router was on the same floor as the desktop. The connection was very slow inspite of my network being a FIOS. The wireless adapter will never connect automatically unless I connect to some other network first and then disconnect that network and then connect to my home network. This product would have been great if it was manufactured and used in 1980s. Do not buy this product even if they sell it for a penny.
customer_reviews.author: Tech Geek

customer_reviews.title: Compact adapter that will make your computer wireless.
customer_reviews.text: Good product that keeps my older HP computer with Windows XP online. Neat, easy to install and program allows for change of connection without difficulty. Will be using it for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not At All What I Expected :(
customer_reviews.text: Well, first of all it did arrive timely and intact w/box, I had to install and reinstall several times before it took and I still barely have a signal. Come to find out that I also need a modem by NETGEAR which will be more money and either way need an internet account so total BS? YESSS I think so but you decide for yourself... OVERALL..I give it an EH......TOO GOOD TO BE TRUE.....USUALLY TRUE..
customer_reviews.author: Angel Star

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The adapter was so easy to setup. I had it up and running in a matter of a few minutes. I do plan on moving my computer farther away from where the Internet comes in, so am hoping that it will be okay farther away.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kathleen Blakeman

customer_reviews.title: just what was needed
customer_reviews.text: we were told by HP tech support that this item had gone bad and it needed to be replaced. I am very happy with the new one and it wasn't expensive at all...
customer_reviews.author: Ron Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 weeks and then dead
customer_reviews.text: Worked fairly well for 3 weeks. Then died. I thought it might be the USB port but it is fine. Netgear used to have great products.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Tipre

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This little gizmo has worked perfectly for me and involved very little set-up. I would highly recommend getting this if you need to make your PC act wirelessly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Everleth

customer_reviews.title: NETGEAR WG-111 WIireless Network Adapter
customer_reviews.text: NETGEAR WG-111 Wireless Network Adapter Failed to get it to work after working 20 hours. Was told by Netgear that the adapter was old and should be replaced with a newer version. Consequently I bought an updated version from a local retailer so that I could read that it would be supportedl by my computer's Operating System, Vista. Thus, I lost $10 on my transaction after taking advandage or your $10 rebate.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Zimbalatti

customer_reviews.title: USB ok
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy but the connection isn't the best. It drops out and the signal is weak. I'm in a small apt., one floor. I doubt this would work in a house if I have problems in an apt. We need to reconnect quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Karonna

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Wireless G adapters available
customer_reviews.text: The Netgear wg111us wireless USB adapter Pulls in signals well and holds em well. I have tried many brands and models of wireless USB adapters, but I keep buying more of these for a reason. I use a linksys router and these adapters(you cannot go wrong for the price)!
customer_reviews.author: B. Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended Seller.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Worked just fine on startup. No problems with installation. Durable. Excellent value for the price. Recommend highly. Many thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Hannibaless

customer_reviews.title: reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in January of 2012 and it has worked without issue since. I am now having some connectivity issues and purchasing a new one. No need to look any further. It worked well for four years.
customer_reviews.author: Christine A Wiekrykas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in, it worked. What more can I say?
customer_reviews.author: G. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: ... pc wireless with no other equipment necessary and works wonderfully!! It took no time to load the ...
customer_reviews.text: This made my pc wireless with no other equipment necessary and works wonderfully!! It took no time to load the driver and I had wireless internet right away. Love it!! The price was 50 - 75% less than what they sell for at the retail stores also, so that can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Leah L

customer_reviews.title: I am sure it works lol
customer_reviews.text: I am sur it works great but I forgot my network password and can't add it lol
customer_reviews.author: DrJaymz

customer_reviews.title: This is like the second time I've ordered this same wireless card ...
customer_reviews.text: This is like the second time I've ordered this same wireless card and yet again I'm amazed... My friend had taken the first one so I got another because it is great quality for a low price.
customer_reviews.author: Lacharo Nottage

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I just wished everything I ever purchased worked out as well.
customer_reviews.author: creekdweller

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless connection with this! Perfect for moving between computers, takes up no space and thankfully NO wires! Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Sterling

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working, not sure why.
customer_reviews.text: It worked for awhile and then stopped working, which I am not sure why. It was a little flimsy but held on for a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: It works until it overheats
customer_reviews.text: I bought this taking a chance that it was the WG111v3 and not the WG111v2, which is known to overheat and drop connections. I'll be searching out another v3 in the future and I'd suggest others do the same if they're considering this model.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, took only 10 minutes and works great. Not one bit of trouble connecting desk top to wire less. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: S. England

customer_reviews.title: Product was great
customer_reviews.text: It was everything i expected and more. It was brand new, works great and came when they said it would. I would definitely recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Great Product-Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I don't have wireless access on my desktop computer. I ordered this and got a really great deal on amazon. The only problem I had was the disc it came with wasn't the updated version, however the representative @ netgear was extremely helpful and I was able to download the correct version! I would recommend this product to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Secilia

customer_reviews.title: Really good.
customer_reviews.text: There's only one flaw with this item and that's the fact that it's bulky. My Dell has 4 USB ports on the back and this wireless key is so bulky that it prevents you from using the USB port to the top or bottom of the key. SO you're wasting two spaces. However, it was friendly to use, the software is a bit cumbersome and unnecessary with some bells and whistles, but all in all I"m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Abercrombie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work! I had the tech at Apple ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not work! I had the tech at Apple try to put it in for me an it did not work. I'm returning it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen M

customer_reviews.title: Great way to bring your old pc to the wireless world!
customer_reviews.text: I have since bought newer versions of this, but It does the job with my netgear n-300 router. A simple usb connection and you have access to your wireless internet!
customer_reviews.author: micheledollman

customer_reviews.title: computer help
customer_reviews.text: this is a must to be able to have service in any other room in the house with the other part.
customer_reviews.author: Clsohio53

customer_reviews.title: NETGEAR WG111US Wireless G Usb Adapter Needs Driver CD
customer_reviews.text: This device will not work without Driver CD which is sold in a package with the device. Performs well once driver is loaded. Buy only if you have the Driver CD and plan to use device on another machine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K. Selke

customer_reviews.title: A+++ product, A++ packaging, A++ service.
customer_reviews.text: Get's me connected quick & easy on any network. With a great connection from a distance.Very easy & nice to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Lessard

customer_reviews.title: Great for price
customer_reviews.text: This is the second product like this I have bought. It is a great buy for the price, I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Does What It's Supposed to Do - No fuss
customer_reviews.text: This thing simply does what it's supposed to do - no fuss. Easy to install. I like the velcro attachment arrangement (if you need to keep it mounted - I do, on my Dell laptop with a dead PCMCIA slot). It connects with my Linksys WRTG54 easily and reliably at 54Mbps (router upstairs, me downstairs). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kofi

customer_reviews.title: USB Adapter Review
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, simple to install, no problems setting it up. Works better than an equivalent D-link unit I tried, i.e., seems to have slightly better range inside the house.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H. Bock, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: USB adaptor
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wireless adaptor for my desktop to get a phone cord off the floor. This one does the trick with no fuss or bother.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The product was easy to install on my computer and worked right away. I am happy I bought it. Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Netgear wireless usb adapter
customer_reviews.text: Solved our internet connection product. The directions for installation did not put the router code in the correct box for FIOS. But we looked it up on the internet and put the code in the correct spot and it works great
customer_reviews.author: camperzany

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect on my older HP computer. Excellent product. New condition in a well packed mailing box.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to replace the cr*ppy wireless card in my friends laptop. The dongle has been working just fine for him. It was everything that it was advertised to be.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney T. Fallon

customer_reviews.title: A bit difficult to install.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't come with the installation CD, it said I had to download it from the website, which is a bit difficult when the product is so you can have internet...other than that it works great. I like the holder/extender for it so the large adapter doesn't take up a ton of room by my USB ports.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: handy
customer_reviews.text: This came in handy. Now all of the pcs have access to the internet in the house.
customer_reviews.author: L. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Netgear WG111US
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this with a Linksys WRT54G wireless router and so far it works, most of the time. I say most of the time because at least once a day it'll drop the wireless connection for a few seconds. It's not the WG111 because I've tried other USB Wireless-G adapters and those also dropped connection at least once a day. It must be my room.
customer_reviews.author: RickDeckard

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work on my computers it need to be updated don't work on windows vista or higher. Was very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: rukinc

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to connect an old computer to the internet. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great and customer service was quick to respond to my questions.
customer_reviews.author: PA Boy

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This wireless usb adapter works pretty well. I had a little trouble using it on a computer with usb 1.1 so we had to use it with another computer. It gets a little hot but it hasn't given us any problems.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kessner

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I love how it picks up the WiFi. The thing I don't like is how hot it get's when it working, It almost burns me.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Sets up pretty quickly have to be careful with it sticking out but I put it in back of computer to avoid damaging it
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: very poor reception/failed immediately
customer_reviews.text: Item became very hot. Could only get connection when I was almost on top of the router. It than failed completely all within 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: M. gerlach

customer_reviews.title: Netgear USB Wireless
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to install and works very well, I am getting 54mps on it from my wireless router. I have had no issues with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Kleiman/CK Entertainment Inc.

customer_reviews.title: dosen't work
customer_reviews.text: I try to use but never work for me, was just a waste of time and money for me. :-0
customer_reviews.author: VALDIRENE BACCHUS

customer_reviews.title: A product that performs quite well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a desktop recently and needed an object that would grant wireless capability to it. This product was the perfect product for me. The price is mediocre. In contrast, the performance of the product is great. I compared it to my laptop's connectivity and it was little faster than the one on my laptop. Easy to install, looks good too. A great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Franciso Romo

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, OK connection
customer_reviews.text: To set up, all it requires is sticking the USB stick into your computer, and running the software. It is pretty basic. The connection is pretty good. I would have expected it to be a bit better, as the router is just a room over in my house, but it is pretty reliable. Search around for cheaper prices, though. Amazon is definitely not the cheapest for this product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shah

customer_reviews.title: WG111US adapter
customer_reviews.text: I have used 12 of these adapters and they all have worked well. They are compact and easy to program. I would use them again. M Carlson
customer_reviews.author: Mel Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Great and it is still working
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. Note to all potential buyers: This adapter tends to be very hot at first and after awhile its normal. So dont be like "OMG this adapter is sooo hot im going to bring this back to amazon blah.. blah.. blah.." its normal u %#$@%$!T so observe first before you complain.

customer_reviews.title: NETGEAR WG111US Wireless-G USB 2.0 Adapter
customer_reviews.text: This product is great as it was very easy to use and install great vendor

customer_reviews.title: Netgear Wireless Adapter-Successful gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item as a birthday gift for my son. It was exactly as it had been described, arrived quickly and in perfect condition. It was also precisely what my son wanted, so it was an all around success.
customer_reviews.author: Anne-Elizabeth Straub

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: As always Negear products meet or exceed my networking needs. The item came quickly and was very easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Wifi
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a neighbor to help get signal for their home pc because I use to have one as well for my desktop. Product works well for what it is.

customer_reviews.title: slow slow slow
customer_reviews.text: umm wish i never got it need more powerfull on! i have broad band and is is slow!

customer_reviews.text: ordered this for a mini sd card, got the one for the larger sd card, seller agreed to rectify this but just sent me another one for the larger sd card.

customer_reviews.title: UnHappy Buyer
customer_reviews.text: The item did not fit to my system, i was looking for Linksys . but ended up with Netgear. It was returned and had to pay more than the price of the Item . Next time NO CHINESE PRODUCTS TO BUY..

customer_reviews.title: Didn't get the right version
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a v3 adapter, and this product came up in the search. It didn't specify which version the adapter was. When I got it, it was a v2 and wouldn't work. The return was exceptionally easy, but I wish I could have gotten the right product to begin with.

customer_reviews.text: Note 1 of (3) purchased is not working !!!!!!, I confirmed by substitution and checked by a geek shop @ best Buy.

customer_reviews.title: Netgear WG111US wireless G usb Adapter
customer_reviews.text: I still did not install the item into my computer. So I donot know yet. I received this item very fast. Try to ask me for review next time. thank

customer_reviews.title: netgear
customer_reviews.text: Could be a great product. I don't know if it is, because it wasn't delievered soon enough, so I had to buy something else.

product_meta.title: NETGEAR WG111US Wireless G USB Adapter
product_meta.description:
Netgear Wireless G Usb Adapter

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
NETGEAR's 54 Mbps Wireless USB 2.0 Adapter enables 54 Mbps wireless Internet access to either your desktop or notebook PC. New antenna technology delivers greater range so you can move extended distances without losing your connection. S High-level WEP encryption shields your network from wireless eavesdroppers without sacrificing performance.New antenna technology provides superior range above previous-generation 802.11b adapters.Supports office roaming for notebook PC users for shared broadband Internet access and resources. Gives you untethered mobility at home, the office, the airport, and other public hotspots. NETGEAR's Wireless LAN Manager lets you create profiles that reflect specific WLAN settings for each place you travel. The WG111 simply plugs into the external USB port of your PC, eliminating the need to open up your desktop PC. 802.11g standard compliance ensures interoperability with existing 802.11b and 802.11g networks.

 Features and Benefits

 

 * Compact, pocket-sized design can easily be carried anywhere 
 * The WG111 simply plugs into the external USB port of your PC, eliminating the need to open up your desktop PC 
 * Features a USB 2.0 interface that is up to 40 times faster than USB 1.1 allowing you to realize full 54 Mbps speed 
 * Setup is now made quick and easy with a new Smart Wizard Install Assistant. 
 * Gain full mobility with your notebook, or place your desktop anywhere in your home, without the need to use unsightly Ethernet cables
feature_bullets: Small form factor for maximum portability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars154 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
